name: bnj946
params: setvar s0, class c0, wff w0, wff w1

stmt.origin: bitri(w0, wal(s0, wi(wcel(cv(s0), c0), w1)), wral(s0, c0, w1))

body.origin:
|- wb(w0, wal(s0, wi(wcel(cv(s0), c0), w1)))
-| wb(w0, wral(s0, c0, w1))
-| wb(wral(s0, c0, w1), wal(s0, wi(wcel(cv(s0), c0), w1)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(w0, wal(s0, wi(wcel(cv(s0), c0), w1)))
-| wb(w0, wral(s0, c0, w1))
-| wb(wral(s0, c0, w1), wal(s0, wi(wcel(cv(s0), c0), w1)))

body.origin: |- wb(wral(s0, c0, w1), wal(s0, wi(wcel(cv(s0), c0), w1)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(w0, wal(s0, wi(wcel(cv(s0), c0), w1)))
-| wb(w0, wral(s0, c0, w1))

comment: First-order logic and set theory. (Contributed by Jonathan Ben-Naim, 3-Jun-2011.) (New usage is discouraged.)
